item.title: My Newsbeuter config file
item.description:
And here's my config file that I use with Newsbeuter.

article-sort-order  date asc
auto-reload         yes
reload-time         60
show-read-feeds     no
show-read-articles  no
mark-as-read-on-hover   no
bookmark-cmd        "~/Development/bookmark"
bookmark-autopilot  no
save-path           "~/Documents/Research"
item.dc:creator: mr_rcollins

item.title: Using RSS like it's 1990
item.description: I'm a big console fan, preferring to do as much work as possible from the command line. So it shouldn't be surprised that I also use RSS even as others have abandoned it for things like Twitter. I prefer to supplement my news feeds with Twitter and not replace it â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
